Recomiendo este juego porque a pesar de la toxicidad, bugs o enojos que te pueda llegar a generar este juego (como en todos o la gran mayoria), logra entretener y dan ganas de aprender más y más el cómo mejorar las técnicas para escapar o matar, ya que en este juego estás en una competición siempre. Si sos competitivo, te gusta el terror/sangre y te gusta la estrategia, este juego es para vos :)

enfim jogo 10/10 deveriam usar a comunidade de sobreviventes e examinar a cabeça deles pra descobrir uma cura pra esquizofrenia

I hate this game

All I'm gonna say is that I doubt this game is gonna get better than it already is. And that isn't even saying it's good either. It's fun, but it's not a well put together game. Adding the fact that it's not even fun a lot of the time, and you'll sometimes get streaks of 5+ games where you just want to drive your head through a wall, and I wouldn't even play the game if I knew it was in this state when I started playing. 

Most unfortunately of all, the addiction is hard to kick, I'm past the point where I baby rage in every game, but what has it been replaced with? Just... sorrow, and disappointment, most of all.

In conclusion: THERE IS NO GUARANTEE YOU WILL ENJOY THIS GAME, EVEN IF YOU ENJOY THIS GAME.

Эта игра явно появилась после того как разрабы поспорили кто сделает самую хуевую оптимизацию в мире. Играю на 1660ti на 50 фпс игра 2017 годас графикой 2001  пидорасы на разрабах пасьянс онлайн играть приятнее играть чем  это дерьмо, зато скины по кд добавляют каждые 2 недели уебки. А вишенкой на торте является просто мега хуевое комьюнити, маны которые стоят афк и сливают игры сурвы которые специально фидят а происходит это из-за низкого порога прохождения в игру.
Lot's of fun, good game to grind.

U téhle hry, nejeden tvor příjde o nervy, ale zároveň se i posere, protože nejednou mi ta hra přivodila infarkt. Každopádně, stále je toho hodně co se dá vylepšit, glitchu a bugu tam je miliarda, toxických hráču, to ani nespočítám, ale pokud máte pevnou vuli a nervy, v pohodě se to dá. Nejlepší však je, když máte partii kamarádu, se kterou si zahrajete, protože někdy se dočkáte dřív konce světa, než načtení matche. Jinak chill, killers jsou opravdu cool, hlavně když přidaj nějakého filmového, každopádně se mě osobně hraje lépe za Survivors. Hru doporučuji, ale je na to potřeba lepší komp, nebo herní laptop. :d

"Nothing is meant to be fair, and apparently by design" - Mathieu Cote (Game director On Dead by Daylight)
I will try to explain why I write a negative review despite having a lot of hours and constantly playing this game to this day.
It's addicting but not in a good way. It's addiction is based on a constant feeling of irritation, the developers acknowledged it during one of their interviews. You will be annoyed by everything. By one of the most toxic communities, by poor balance decisions, countless bugs. Despite bringing the feeling of satisfaction sometimes, your mental state overall will be worse by the end of most play sessions. You won't play this game because you like it, you will play it because you're addicted to the constant feeling of surpassing the irritation. And the worst part is that you will feel rewarded because of the fact that you outplayed players who are there to mock you and verbally abuse you by the end of a game. It's not healthy no matter how you look at it. Even if you have "thick skin", it's simply unenjoyable to waste your time on such people when you think about it.
Talking about the other reasons why I can't recommend this game: 
- It requires you to waste too much time grinding and paying. Licenced characters can only be purchased via real money and if you want to get original ones for free, you need to put 100 hours for each character. And there are so many of them, it may take 1000 hours to gain them all for free. 
- The developers work on their game when they WANT. The reason for that is the fact that this game does not have any competition. This brings flaws and small patches that do not really feel drastic and entertaining. Moreover, if the upcoming changes are disliked by the community, they will be rolled anyways since what can people do, find another Dead By Daylight? Money were put into creation of the things players didn't like, get it or leave. Oh, wait, you won't. 
- The game feels dull. We have no new content despite new killers and perks that kind of change gameplay. The issue here is that the perks don't do much, currently the game has a few strong perks that the community takes and the other perks are not being used at all unless a player wants to feel less powerful for some reason. And the killers often feel dull as well. Instead of working on the previous perks and killers the developers prefer to make new perks and killers for the sake of pumping up money.
- The developers obviously lean towards the side that brings more money with the help of the cosmetics. It's not a secret that killer issues take much more time to be solved when the survivor ones. It brings unfairness into the game in certain cases.
- Moderation on the Steam and the official forums will literally ban you for showing any concern about the game's health. If you complain too much, well, stop spreading negativity. This creates a false sense of positivity when the community is furious at BHVR at the moment.
- The support isn't really helpful and deals with certain issues quite poorly.
Please, do not support this mess. It looks fun on the outside but it's a mess.
----
I would like to mention one pretty significant thing about the game's developers.
The community asked for colorblind setting for more than 4 years. This request has been dismissed until recently.
One of the developers called the whole thing boring. Clearly they aren't interested in wasting resources on something that won't bring them much income. 
I don't know about you but treating people with poor ability to determine colors like that is speaking volumes about the overall way the developers treat their community.
